title: Nadia Chaves

title: Golden Tweet
subtitle: My thoughts, Australia is a multicultural society and over the years many people have immigrated into the country, also accepting many genuine refugees. The Government has set a standard for entry into Australia for very good reasons, so only genuine people are able to enter. pic.twitter.com/4MDh06kMO4
